ow.dht
インタフェース DHT<V extends java.io.Serializable>

型パラメータ:
V - type of a value put on the DHT.
すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
HighLevelService
既知のサブインタフェースの一覧:
Memcached
既知の実装クラスの一覧:
BasicDHTImpl, CHTImpl, ChurnTolerantDHTImpl, MemcachedImpl
public interface DHT<V extends java.io.Serializable>
extends HighLevelService

A DHT interface.

インタフェース ow.util.HighLevelService から継承されたメソッド
clearRoutingTable, getLastKeys, getLastRoutingResults, getRoutingAlgorithmConfiguration, getRoutingService, getRoutingTableString, getSelfIDAddressPair, joinOverlay, joinOverlay, resume, setStatCollectorAddress, stop, suspend
 

メソッドの詳細

clearDHTState

void clearDHTState()
Clears all DHT-related states, e.g. key-value pairs.

put

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>> put(ID key,
                                V value)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
Puts a pair of the specified key and value. Note that multiple values associated to the same key can be stored, but same (equals()) values are unified. Sets a secret with (setHashedSecretForPut(ByteArray)) method if you want to remove the key-value pair later.

戻り値:
values which have existed. null if not stored.
例外:
java.lang.Exception

put

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>> put(ID key,
                                V[] values)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
例外:
java.lang.Exception

put

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>>[] put(DHT.PutRequest<V>[] requests)
                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
Puts multiple key-value pairs collectively.

パラメータ:
requests - put requests.
戻り値:
values which have existed. an element of the array is null if not stored.
例外:
java.lang.Exception

get

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>> get(ID key)
                                                             throws RoutingException
Returns a set of values associated to the specified key.

戻り値:
null if no value was found.
例外:
RoutingException

get

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>>[] get(ID[] keys)
Performs multiple get operations collectively.

remove

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>> remove(ID key,
                                   V[] value,
                                   ByteArray hashedSecret)
                                                                throws RoutingException
Removes a pair of the specified key and value.

パラメータ:
hashedSecret - a secret hashed with SHA1.
戻り値:
the associated value if found. null if not found.
例外:
RoutingException

remove

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>> remove(ID key,
                                   ID[] valueHash,
                                   ByteArray hashedSecret)
                                                                throws RoutingException
Removes a pair of the specified key and hashed value.

パラメータ:
valueHash - hash of the value which is removed. SHA1(value.toString().getBytes("UTF-8")).
hashedSecret - a secret hashed with SHA1.
戻り値:
the associated value if found. null if not found.
例外:
RoutingException

remove

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>> remove(ID key,
                                   ByteArray hashedSecret)
                                                                throws RoutingException
Removes all values associated to the specified key.

パラメータ:
hashedSecret - a secret hashed with SHA1.
戻り値:
all found values. null if not found.
例外:
RoutingException

remove

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>>[] remove(DHT.RemoveRequest<V>[] requests,
                                     ByteArray hashedSecret)
Performs multiple remove operations collectively.

setHashedSecretForPut

ByteArray setHashedSecretForPut(ByteArray hashedSecret)
Sets a secret for following put operations. The stored pair can be removed later with the specified secret.

setTTLForPut

long setTTLForPut(long ttl)
Sets TTL (in millisecond) for following put operations.

getLocalKeys

java.util.Set<ID> getLocalKeys()

getLocalValues

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>> getLocalValues(ID key)

getGlobalKeys

java.util.Set<ID> getGlobalKeys()

getGlobalValues

java.util.Set<ValueInfo<V>> getGlobalValues(ID key)

getConfiguration

DHTConfiguration getConfiguration()
定義:
インタフェース HighLevelService 内の getConfiguration
